iti75:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesaññeva na dātā hoti, samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ.
iti75:3.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo avuṭṭhikasamo hoti.
iti75:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ekaccānaṃ dātā hoti, ekaccānaṃ na dātā hoti samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ.
iti75:4.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo padesavassī hoti.
iti75:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesaṃva deti, samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ.
iti75:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sabbatthābhivassī hoti.
iti75:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
iti75:11.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
